duties_responsibilities.duty: Consult on SAP IS-U FICA functionality and implementation for large projects.
Manage and lead support projects and full life cycle implementations of SAP IS-U FICA.
Utilize knowledge of SAP Utilities and functional aspects of SAP FICA for project execution.
Provide support and guidance in the creation of functional specifications and testing support.
Understand and apply regulatory requirements for Utilities in the industry.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
